meanings.definition: A person or thing that unpacks.
meanings.sent1: The unpackers quickly opened all the boxes.
meanings.sent2: The unpackers were efficient in their work.
meanings.sent3: The unpackers found a surprise gift hidden in one of the boxes.
meanings.sent4: The unpackers were like busy bees, buzzing around the room.
meanings.sent5: The unpackers carefully handled fragile items with precision.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used for unpacking.
meanings.sent1: She used the unpackers to cut through the tape.
meanings.sent2: The unpackers made the task much easier.
meanings.sent3: The unpackers were so sharp they could slice through anything.
meanings.sent4: The unpackers gleamed in the sunlight, ready for use.
meanings.sent5: The unpackers had a comfortable grip for easy handling.

meanings.sent1: Unpacking can be tiring after a long journey.
meanings.sent2: The unpackers completed the unpacking in record time.
meanings.sent3: The unpackers turned unpacking into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The unpackers transformed the chaotic mess into an organized space.
meanings.sent5: The unpackers brought order to the chaos through their unpacking skills.
